About Me

Hello, my name is Andreas, and I‚Äôm an AI Engineer currently serving as a Senior Technology Consultant at EY. With a wealth of experience in Python, artificial intelligence, and machine learning, I specialize in designing and implementing sophisticated systems to solve complex challenges. My expertise extends to creating efficient data pipelines, and I have a strong background in developing REST APIs, micro-services, and event-driven architectures that ensure smooth data transmission and processing.

I am deeply familiar with best practices in software development, which I apply rigorously to ensure the quality and reliability of my work. My comprehensive understanding of CI/CD, particularly with GitHub Actions, allows me to automate tests, builds, and deployments, facilitating the swift and consistent delivery of software updates. Moreover, I have a demonstrated history of leading teams to success by employing Agile methodologies effectively.

In my professional endeavors, I leverage technologies such as Azure for scalable cloud solutions and Kafka for real-time data streaming. My proficiency in MLOps utilizing tools like MLFlow, empowers me to oversee and optimize machine learning workflows, ensuring the efficient and dependable deployment of AI models.

Experience

Ernst & Young Global Limited

Senior Technology Consultant

July 2021 - Present

https://www.ey.com/en_gr

Empowering top-tier clients with cutting-edge AI solutions at EY.

I assist high-profile clients in addressing data-related challenges by implementing AI-powered end-to-end solutions. During my tenure at EY, my contributions have included:

  • Designing and implementing REST APIs for various AI modules, utilizing a microservices architecture to enable asynchronous task execution for long-running processes. This involved leveraging technologies such as MLFlow, Azure AKS, Azure ML, Azure AI Services, and OpenAI.
  • Developing an event-driven hybrid (cloud and on-premise) architecture using Apache Kafka, MLFlow, and Azure to facilitate predictive maintenance based on streaming IoT data from factory sensors.
  • Applying AI techniques to analyze legal and regulatory documents, enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of data processing.
  • Utilizing AI for the deduplication and cleansing of educational data as well as CRM databases, significantly improving data quality and usability.
  • Designing and implementing Generative AI applications for quality assurance, summarization, and field extraction, streamlining complex tasks and providing valuable insights.
  • Executing comprehensive MLOps activities and leading the development of full-cycle AI-powered solutions, from conception to deployment, ensuring robust and scalable systems.
  • Serving as the Azure administrator for the ‚ÄúAI and Data‚Äù team, I am responsible for the management, optimization, and governance of cloud resources, ensuring that our AI initiatives and data workflows are supported effectively and adhere to best practices and compliance standards.
  • Successfully led teams in high-stakes environments, guiding them through complex project lifecycles and ensuring the delivery of innovative AI solutions that meet and exceed client expectations.
  • Championing software excellence by encouraging my team through comprehensive guides and engaging presentations to adhere to best practices and write clean, maintainable code, thereby elevating the overall quality and sustainability of our software solutions.
